name: üó£Feedback Kit
description:
Want good feedback from your team? Feedback Kit is here to help you ask for the type of feedback you need in a reliable and methodical way, while giving your team the tools to easily give feedback in the way you're asking for it.


Whether it's through dot voting exercises, silent critiques, general discussions, or value grid exercises Feedback Kit helps you establish context, set the stage, and select a method of feedback you're hoping to receive from your team.


If you have any feature requests or recommendations please feel free to reach out on Twitter to @mixpanel or @markjohnsoncc.
